content: It's a known fact that most "progressives" are ardently opposed to economic progress in the US. It's why we've had no new oil refineries for decades, no new nuclear power plants ("progressives" are irrationally frightened to death of nuclear power), and why they've consistently tried to close down the coal mines even though the US on its worst smoggy days evinces nowhere near the pollution rampant in China--it's not even close. It really does figure that the only kinds of power the "progressives" support are the kinds of power that can't begin to even approach the power demands of the country--ie, foolish, wasteful expenditures of capital to learn what we already know, which is that green power is no answer at all. Hell, if we had the dream of nuclear fusion power plants, its 100-1 odds the "progressives" would try to kill it! Progressives in our country today are like some Celtic cult--backwards in the extreme on a wide number of issues, advocating pie-in-the-sky solutions that in reality are no solutions at all--but mere fantasy, instead. Progressives are shameful, throwback embarrassments in America today.
